content: Is there an equivalent of String.toNat for Float (i.e. String.toFloat) and for Int (i.e. String.toInt)? The documentation does not seem to show that these exist. If that's the case, are there easy ways to convert strings to floats or ints?
There was this previous question that may be relevant.
I'm guessing you could call docs#reprStr on it? i see i misread the question
